mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, user_name, email, password, phone, address, birthday, join_date, login_date, user_status, level, qr_Code) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{birthday}, #{join_date}, #{login_date}, #{user_status}, #{level}, #{qrCode})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM user WHERE email = LOWER(#{email}) AND user_name = LOWER(#{user_name})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET password = #{password} WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
UPDATE user SET qr_Code = #{qrCode} WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, e.enrollment_id, e.class_id, c.class_name, c.start_date, c.end_date, c.start_time, c.end_time, c.price FROM enrollment e INNER JOIN user u ON u.user_id = #{user_id} INNER JOIN class c ON e.class_id = c.class_id WHERE e.user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, f.facility_name, p.product_id, p.product_name, p.price, p.size, r.rental_date, r.return_date FROM rental r INNER JOIN user u ON u.user_id = r.user_id INNER JOIN product p ON p.product_id = r.product_id INNER JOIN facility f ON f.facility_id = p.facility_id WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id};
